header.subtitle.message: Our solutions make familiarization possible for both own and hired equipment, and provide a collected overview of documented and certified competence.

general.readmore.description: The label used to link to the full article

general.contactus.title.message: Want to know more? Contact us
general.contactus.title.description: The label used to link to the contact page

home.banner.title1.description: The title of the home page

home.banner.title2.description: The title of the home page part two

home.safety.title.description: The title of the safety section on the home page

home.safety.what.message: DigiQuip is the hub that easily connects your machinery and equipment fleet with available documentation, inspection procedures, safety training, and specific machine and equipment training.
home.safety.what.description: The description of the safety section on the home page

home.safety.how.message: -So that the right people use the right machine in the right way.
home.safety.how.description: The how part of the description of the safety section on the home page

home.safeuse.title.message: Correct use of equipment depends on the necessary training and competence
home.safeuse.title.description: The title of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.safeuse.arg1.message: DigiQuip is a technology company that simplifies the management of competence, training, and documentation. We offer unique solutions for conducting equipment-specific training, also known as type training or machine-specific training. In addition, our solutions can be used to keep track of courses, competence certificates, project experience, and education.
home.safeuse.arg1.description: The first argument of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.safeuse.arg2.message: At the construction site? By scanning a QR code or another identifier, individuals receive instant confirmation of whether they have the appropriate and necessary documented training to use that specific machine, tool, or safety equipment. Reporting or completion of training can be done immediately. This ensures that the right people use the right equipment in the right way.
home.safeuse.arg2.description: The second argument of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.safeuse.arg3.message: By placing QR codes on machines or equipment, users gain immediate access to their own competency status for the specific work equipment.
home.safeuse.arg3.description: The third argument of the safe use of machinery section on the home page

home.consolidate.title.message: Full control over equipment and documentation
home.consolidate.title.description: The title of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.arg1.message: Inspections, documents, and user manuals for equipment should always be easily accessible when needed. Why? This makes it easier to ensure that equipment is well-maintained and only used when it is safe to do so.
home.consolidate.arg1.description: The first argument of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.arg2.message: At the construction site? When a worker or inspector scans the equipment's identifier, they can find the latest inspection status, documents, and user manual. Additionally, a pre-use inspection can be quickly carried out and documented, either with or without a digital checklist.
home.consolidate.arg2.description: The second argument of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.point1.message: Digital checklists for machines and equipment.
home.consolidate.point1.description: The first point of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.point2.message: Perform equipment inspections at the right time.
home.consolidate.point2.description: The second point of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.consolidate.point3.description: The third point of the consolidate your training section on the home page

home.expert.title.message: Efficient execution and documentation of expert inspections
home.expert.title.description: The title of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.arg1.message: With our solution, inspectors can efficiently carry out their work from planning to follow-up, including thorough documentation.
home.expert.arg1.description: The first argument of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.arg2.message: Machine owners also gain complete visibility into the status, inspection deadlines, and necessary documentation.
home.expert.arg2.description: The second argument of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.point1.message: Streamline planning with a comprehensive machine overview.
home.expert.point1.description: The first point of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.point2.description: The second point of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.expert.point3.message: Easily conduct and document annual inspections.
home.expert.point3.description: The third point of the expertise and experience section on the home page

home.ourpartners.title.description: The title of the our partners section on the home page

home.contact.title.message: Focused on the right use of equipment at the right time?
home.contact.title.description: The title of the contact section on the home page

home.contact.button.description: The button label of the contact section on the home page

competence.banner.title1.message: Kvipp is a super simple, and free, solution for
competence.banner.title1.description: The title of the competence page part one

competence.banner.title2.description: The title of the competence page part two

kvippbenefits.title1.description: The title of the first section on the Kvipp page

kvippbenefits.title2.description: The second title of the first section on the Kvipp page

kvippbenefits.arg1.message: With Kvipp, ensuring everyone has equipment-specific training is easier than ever. Say goodbye to complicated logins and registrations!
kvippbenefits.arg1.description: The first argument of the first Kvipp section

kvippbenefits.arg2.message: Kvipp can be used anytime, anywhere, with no preparation or commitment required.

kvippbenefits.arg3.message: All you need is a phone, internet access, and an HSE card (or driving licence).

kvipp-get-started.arg1.message: Kvipp is available whenever and wherever you need it, whether you're checking or completing training:

kvipp-get-started.point2.message: Scan the equipment's identifier (QR code/NFC tag) or use artificial intelligence to recognise the equipment

kvipp-get-started.point3.message: Identify the person using their HSE card or driving licence. Scan the QR code on the HSE card or take a picture of the driving licence and let artificial intelligence do the work

kvipp-kreg.arg1.message: When a person with the role "instructor" provides training to any of your employees, the result is automatically uploaded to Kompetanseregisteret (K-REG). This includes both internal training and training received from rental companies, manufacturers and others who use Kvipp and have registered instructors.

bedrift.banner.title1.message: Kvipp Bedrift gives you full control over training with minimal effort

bedrift.benefits.title2.message: you gain an overview of training.

bedrift.benefits.arg1.message: For just NOK 1390 per month (excl. VAT), the company gains an overview of all equipment-specific training and documentation - always available and up to date.

bedrift.benefits.point1.message: Your employees are automatically and securely added to the solution via the HSE card integration

bedrift.benefits.point2.message: Equipment and documentation are automatically added to the overview after training is completed

bedrift.benefits.point3.message: Overview and gap analyses in real time. Get a continuous overview of who has or lacks training

bedrift.groups.arg1.message: An overview of completed training is available in Kvipp Bedrift. If you use the HSE card, the person and training are automatically linked to the correct organisation.

bedrift.groups.point1.message: Check what training each person has, and download the relevant documentation

bedrift.groups.point2.message: Check who can use which work equipment

bedrift.groups.point3.message: Create groups with individuals and equipment, and gain an overview of status and progression. In the screenshot, you can see that individuals have training on half of the equipment in the group, and you will be able to drill down to more details.

bedrift.integrations.title.message: Automatically transfer all equipment-specific training to Kompetanseregisteret (K-REG)
bedrift.integrations.title.description: Title for the integrations section on the bedrift page

bedrift.integrations.description.message: When a person with the role "instructor" provides training to any of your employees, the result is automatically uploaded to Kompetanseregisteret (K-REG). This includes, in addition to internal training, training received from rental companies, manufacturers and others who use Kvipp and have registered instructors. K-REG is a registry operated by Sentralregisteret.
bedrift.integrations.description.description: Description for the integrations section on the bedrift page

bedrift.integrations.link.description: Link text for the integrations section on the bedrift page

bedrift.integrations.pricing.message: For 500kr per month you get this integration.
bedrift.integrations.pricing.description: Pricing information for the integrations section on the bedrift page

bedrift.integrations.orderNow.description: Call to action button text for ordering the integration

bedrift.integrations.emailUs.description: Email button text for the integration

bedrift.integrations.benefit1.description: First benefit of the K-REG integration

bedrift.integrations.benefit2.description: Second benefit of the K-REG integration

bedrift.integrations.benefit3.description: Third benefit of the K-REG integration

bedrift.integrations.hmsInfo.message: Kompetanseregisteret has an integration with HMSREG. This means you will also get equipment-specific training visible in HMSREG. Contact Sentralregisteret for more information about this,

workequipment.banner.title1.description: The first title of the work equipment page

workequipment.systematized_documentation.message: Full control with the Maintenance module
workequipment.systematized_documentation.description: The title of the systematized documentation section in the work equipment page

workequipment.systematized_documentation.message: With the Maintenance module, you get full insight into the condition of your equipment fleet, both in the field and at the office.

workequipment.machines_equipment.arg1.message: With Trygg Maskin, operators quickly access everything they need for safe and efficient use via a QR code attached to the equipment

workequipment.machineinsights.arg1.message: The expert control module makes it easy to perform both expert inspections and other controls for your equipment fleet.

policy.banner.title1.message: A more efficient and safe workday

policywhy.arg1.message: Everyone who works with machines and equipment must have a policy where the risk of injury during use is assessed and when training should be conducted. And this must be documented.

policywhy.arg2.message: With documented policy, you ensure full overview of when training is needed - and when it is not necessary. Result? Smoother everyday life for everyone and zero stress during inspections.

policywhy.arg3.message: With policy and risk assessment you get:

policywhy.point1.message: Full control over which training should be given on various work equipment

policywhy.point2.message: Solid documentation, which for example can be shown during inspections

policy-what.arg1.message: Categorize equipment smart: Five similar circular saws = one training (not five!)

policy-what.point2.message: Get everything in place: Policy, documentation and overview - all collected in one place

policy-what.point4b.message: Assess probability of injury and consequences

policy-what.point4c.message: Get automatic policy that everyone can follow

policy-what.point5.message: With Kvipp, everyone knows when training is needed, and you avoid unnecessary training, uncertainty and forms.

aboutus.banner.title1.description: The title of banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.intro.message: After building up a rental business over several years, Lars experienced a clear need to improve the safety of customers.
aboutus.banner.intro.description: Intro sentence for about us banner

aboutus.banner.arg1.message: Incorrect use of equipment is potentially very risky and can lead to serious injuries, or, in worst case, even death. The lack of systematic equipment-specific training and documentation was one of the biggest challenges.
aboutus.banner.arg1.description: The first argument of the banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.arg2.message: The need was clear – to offer the market a digital solution that makes it easy to comply with legal requirements for equipment-specific training and equipment control. The regulations on the execution of work require that everyone who uses dangerous work equipment must have documented training on the specific model they are to operate, and it must be verified.
aboutus.banner.arg2.description: The second argument of the banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.banner.arg3.message: Lars founded DigiQuip in 2019 to solve this challenge and make HSE work easier.
aboutus.banner.arg3.description: The third argument of the banner section in the aboutus page

aboutus.contact.title.message: DigiQuip helps you solve equipment training, machine inspections and in general to get the control you need
aboutus.contact.title.description: The title of contact section in the aboutus page

aboutus.team.title.description: The title of team section in the aboutus page

aboutus.team.button_lavel.description: The button lavel of team section in the aboutus page

navbar.label.contact_us.description: Navbar item with label Contact us

navbar.label.book_meeting.description: Navbar item with label Book a Meeting

navbar.label.kvipp_bedrift.description: Navbar item with label Kvipp Bedrift

navbar.label.trygg_maskin.description: Navbar item with label Trygg Maskin

navbar.label.sign_in.description: Navbar item with label Sign in

home.news.news1desc.message: All employees must receive training on the type of work equipment they will be using. This is about ensuring health, safety, environmental protection and profitability. In Kvipp, training can be easily completed and documented digitally anytime - for free! You only need a phone and an HSE card (or other ID), with no preparation or follow-up work required.

home.news.news2title.message: Upload trainings from Kvipp to K-REG (and HMSREG)

home.news.news2desc.message: Automatically transfer equipment-specific training from Kvipp to Kompetanseregisteret (K-REG). When a person with the role of instructor provides training to your employees, the result is automatically uploaded to Kompetanseregisteret. Furthermore, K-REG shares competence with HMSREG.

home.news.news3title.message: Rental Group and DigiQuip make training easier and safer

home.news.news3desc.message: Rental Group (RG) is early to offer Kvipp to their customers. The collaboration creates real difference for customers with easy access to training right on their mobile, better control and overview, and everything gathered in one place.

home.news.news4title.message: SD Byggentreprenør AS avoids reactions from Arbeidstilsynet

home.news.news4desc.message: An unannounced visit from the Norwegian Labour Inspection Authority can be a stressful experience for any business. For SD Byggentreprenør AS, such a visit became the start of a journey to improve their HSE routines and ensure they followed the rules for training on dangerous work equipment – a process that can be valuable for all businesses wishing to strengthen their HSE practices.

home.news.news5desc.message: At NCC Område Oslo, they have seen a pattern: Unwanted incidents often involved lack of training. With the implementation of Kvipp, there is both increased awareness around training and NCC experiences that the number of injuries is decreasing.

home.news.news6title.message: From backlog to control, in three months

home.news.news6desc.message: Betonmast Innlandet has gone from being behind on documentation to taking full control. In this article, the Betonmast team shares more about how they got started, and tips and advice for others who are getting started.

integrations.kompetanseregisteret.arg1.message: Our integrations make it easy to connect Kvipp with your existing HSE systems and workflows. We offer API integrations and standardized solutions that ensure data flows seamlessly between your systems.

integrations.kompetanseregisteret.point1.message: API integrations for automatic data transfer

integrations.kompetanseregisteret.point2.message: Compatibility with all major HSE systems

integrations.onlet.arg1.message: Our integrations provide you with several benefits that reduce manual work and increase the efficiency of your HSE work. You get automatic data synchronization and reduce the risk of errors.

integrations.tailored.arg1.message: We make it easy to get started with our integrations. Our team helps you with setup and configuration, and we offer comprehensive documentation and support to ensure a smooth implementation.

kreg.integration.description.message: Equipment-specific training can be uploaded directly to K-REG, either as an add-on to Kvipp Bedrift or as a standalone solution. Furthermore, K-REG shares competence with HMSREG.

kreg.integration.kvippBedrift.descriptio.message: With Kvipp Bedrift, you have full overview of who has which training and who may be missing training. You can also share training further to K-REG, and thus HMSREG.

kreg.integration.kvipp.description.message: If you don't need an overview, the training can be uploaded directly to K-REG. You then carry out all training using Kvipp in the field. The system then ensures that this is uploaded to K-REG, and thus HMSREG.

kreg.integration.faq.description1.message: Practical training carried out by someone with the role of "instructor" is transferred to K-REG. Self-declaration and other training are not transferred.

kreg.integration.faq.description2.message: The instructor role is set either in Kvipp Bedrift or by us. If you are to have the standalone integration, everyone in your business will automatically get the instructor role.

kreg.integration.cta.message: To order, you can either call us at 69 83 85 00, send an email to Tom Freddy at tfb@digiquip.no, or fill out the form.

integrations.cards.kompetanseregisteret..message: Visible in HMSREG via the Kompetanseregisteret
If you have Kvipp Bedrift, you can activate the integration as an add-on. Contact us to activate.
You can use Kvipp in the field and transfer training to the Kompetanseregisteret completely standalone without Kvipp Bedrift. Contact us to activate.

integrations.cards.onlet.pricing.title.message: Full integration with Onlet for expert control

integrations.cards.onlet.pricing.descrip.message: We invoice per control that is updated in Onlet

integrations.cards.onlet.note.message: Note: Infobric has its own costs associated with the integration. For more information, contact Infobric: support@infobriconlet.no

integrations.cards.digitool.point1.message: Control status and reports available directly in the chosen product (Kvipp or Trygg Maskin)

integrations.cards.digitool.pricing.desc.message: Integration with DigiTool for expert control

integrations.cards.digitool.pricing.pric.message: This integration is included at no extra cost.

integrations.cards.maskinregisteret.poin.message: Automatic import of machines and equipment in DigiQuip
Full overview of expert control performed in the Maskinregisteret

integrations.cards.maskinregisteret.pric.message: Automatic import of machines and equipment from the Maskinregisteret
This integration is included at no extra cost.

kreg.integration.how.scanCard.descriptio.message: Automatic connection to company. Via the Arbeidstilsynets API, Kvipp retrieves the correct name, date of birth and company. This ensures the documentation is correct from the start!

kreg.integration.how.scanEquipment.descr.message: Scan QR code (Reginn, DigiQuip) or take a picture of the equipment. From the image, artificial intelligence interprets brand and model. The only thing you need to do is confirm or change the name. PS: Make sure to take a picture where both brand and model are captured.

kreg.integration.how.description.message: When training is given, ALL necessary information and documentation (PDF) is transferred to K-REG. Who has received and given training, which equipment (brand and model) and date.

kreg.integration.how.note.message: Only practical training given by people with the instructor role is transferred. We'll fix this when you activate the integration.

integrations.cards.defaultPrice.message: For 500kr per month you get this integration.

onlet.integration.description.message: With the integration between DigiQuip and Onlet, you get automatic updates of control data. When a control is completed in DigiQuip or when we receive controls from M-REG or Digitool, Onlet is updated the next day with status, next control date and control report.

onlet.integration.faq.description1.message: When a control is completed in DigiQuip or when we receive controls from M-REG or Digitool, Onlet is automatically updated the next day with status, next control date and control report.

onlet.integration.faq.description2.message: This eliminates the need for manual data registration and ensures that all information is updated and synchronized between the systems.

onlet.integration.cta.message: Price for the service is 25 kr per control. To order, you can either call us at 69 83 85 00, send an email to Tom Freddy at tfb@digiquip.no, or fill out the form.

digitool.integration.description.message: Automatic transfer of control status and control reports from Digitool to DigiQuip. The data becomes available immediately, so you always see the latest update. Completely without delay and without extra work!

maskinregisteret.integration.description.message: Integration with the Maskinregisteret (M-REG) to automatically import work equipment and expert control to DigiQuip.

skreddersydd.integration.description.message: Do you already have a system you want us to integrate with? Contact us and we'll find a solution.

read-more-and-order.description: Button text for reading more and ordering

prices.banner.subtitle.message: Here are our prices. Feel free to contact us for a demo!

aboutus.banner.imageAlt.description: Alt text for about us banner image

contact.form.description.message: Unsure who you want to talk to or do you have a case that should go to support? See the contact information below or fill out the form.
